header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: DIY – heating Lunch food Plans – ANON’s planned coastal walk Family members Longevity of household items and cars Christmas/New Year opening hours Free haircuts Virgin experience days Bicycles Planning a walk Buying furniture
header.activity: Family talking about ANON’s new home and making plans for a walk and furniture shopping
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, anecdote telling, making arrangements
